extendedInfo.description: Birthday parties are many times stressful and take a lot of your valuable time, getting there is just the half of the fun. There is a lot more to do, things like deciding on the theme, decorations, and activities makes the days leading up to the event seem like part of the celebration itself. It needn't be elaborate -- kids will be happy with a small party as long as they are made to feel special. Even a simple party requires planning; the sooner you start organizing, the earlier the excitement begins and the fewer details you'll have to work out on the day itself.Call us today to reserve your day, the sooner the better!

reviews.title: Just an ad!
reviews.comment: Thought this was an app to help me organize and plan my kids party. Its an ad for you to call this actual party planner. BOGUS!!! uninstall.
reviews.author: Jessica Beach

reviews.title: Not an app!!!!
reviews.comment: Its an advertisment to get you in and hire a party planning company!!!! Waste of time!!!!!
reviews.author: Michelle Schepperly

reviews.title: Excelente servicio!
reviews.comment: Gracias a su ayuda hemos podido tener mejores recuerdos de los cumplea\303\261os de nuestros hijos. Sin su ayuda nada hubiera sido igual. Se las recomiendo!
reviews.author: Edgar Romero
